name: Fish Therapy
description:
Pet the fish to keep them happy. If one fish dies, the others will get unhappy faster.  See how long you can keep all your fish alive! 

LEFT CLICK and MOVE MOUSE in small rubbing motions over the fish to increase happiness bar. (You can even hold down the left mouse button the entire time, just keep rubbing those fish. Practice in the controls area!)

You can also click the axolotl, he is easy to take care of though.

Enjoy!
